title: Red-Wine Pasta With Pancetta and Chestnuts
sub_head: Sick of the same old spaghetti? Try red-wine pasta with chestnuts and pancetta, or fettuccine with a luscious mushroom rag√π. 5 quick, comforting recipes that put the new back in noodles.
body: To explore and search through all our recipes, check out the new WSJ Recipes page.
